name: Out Of Control (Samsterjam)
description:
In games all around we take "control" for granted, this game explores the concept of a limit to your "control". For every input that effects the game, you use up a varying degree of your "control".  

     The name plays on the theme "Out Of Control" for the GMTK  2020 Game-jam, which in my game refers to when you've used up the last bit of your available "control". While I didn't get to make quite enough levels to meet my goal, I hope you enjoy this game.
